turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is this Sonny's Pizza ?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes how may I help you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you still have the 3 lzrge pizza deal ?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes we do Would you like the deal

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thanks !

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Go ahead with you 1st pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for the 1st one I would like cheese and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok cheese and mushrooms on the 1st pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for pizza @ I wouls like just cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok just cheese on #2

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: on the 3rd pizza I would like all veggies on wheat bread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok all veggies on wheat bread for the 3rd pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you run that back to me ?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. On pizza one you would like cheese and mushrooms, on 2 you would like plain cheese, and on 3 you would like veggies on wheat.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all I need

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok we have all you info on file. The total would be 19.99

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Charge it to the visa I have on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Your receipt will be texted to you any second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be to you in 25 minutes. Is it anyther else I can get for you ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I am good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks for ordering at Sonny's pizza have a great day

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you too !
